data.actual_result: After screen is rotated, the app blackscreens for a split second followed by you being thrown back in chat, closing all menus and cancelling everything you were doing. An error is thrown in the Android logcat: `android. view. WindowLeaked: Activity com. discord. app. AppActivity has leaked window android. widget. PopupWindow$PopupDecorView that was originally added here`
data.short_description: [Huawei/Honor and OnePlus devices running Android 8+ only] When any overflow or dropdown menu is open, rotating the screen softcrashes the UI and shoots you back to chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Find any activity in the app featuring an overflow menu. For example User settings with the Debug option, Server settings with the Delete server option, Channel settings with Reset notification settings option, etc. It also happens with dropdown menus such as the channel dropdown in create invite screen and the role filter dropdown in Server Settings > Members - Expand the overflow/dropdown menu - While menu is open, rotate screen
